name: Possession in Great Measure (大有, Dà Yǒu)

core_meaning.legge_1899_public_domain: Tâ Yû indicates that, (under the circumstances which it implies), there will be great progress and success.
core_meaning.normalized_summary: Great possession — wealth, power, influence. It's favorable, but only if it's governed by humility, discipline, and service. The blessing stays clean when ego stays restrained and resources are used for the greater order instead of self-glorification.

translations.text: In the first NINE, undivided, there is no approach to what is injurious, and there is no error. Let there be a realisation of the difficulty (and danger of the position), and there will be no error (to the end).
初九：無交害，匪咎，艱則無咎。

lines.normalized_meaning: Stay out of corrupt entanglements. You're clear of harm and not at fault. Keep remembering how risky this position is and stay disciplined to remain blameless.

translations.text: In the second NINE, undivided, we have a large waggon with its load. In whatever direction advance is made, there will be no error.
九二：大車以載，有攸往，無咎。

lines.normalized_meaning: You have the capacity and support to move something big. Your position can carry weight responsibly, so forward motion is not a mistake.

translations.text: The third NINE, undivided, shows us a feudal prince presenting his offerings to the Son of Heaven. A small man would be unequal (to such a duty).
九三：公用亨于天子，小人弗克。

lines.normalized_meaning: High service in front of true power. Only someone noble can stand there without disgracing the role. Petty ambition collapses under that responsibility.

translations.text: The fourth NINE, undivided, shows its subject keeping his great resources under restraint. There will be no error.

lines.normalized_meaning: Hold back. Do not flaunt power. Quiet control and non-excess keep you clear of blame.

translations.text: The fifth SIX, divided, shows the sincerity of its subject reciprocated by that of all the others (represented in the hexagram). Let him display a proper majesty, and there will be good fortune.

lines.normalized_meaning: Central leadership is trusted and answered with loyalty. Stay sincere, but also carry rightful authority. Benevolence plus presence = good fortune.

translations.text: The topmost NINE, undivided, shows its subject with help accorded to him from Heaven. There will be good fortune, advantage in every respect.
上九：自天祐之，吉，無不利。

lines.normalized_meaning: Heaven backs you. Favor is active; everything aligns. This is peak blessing — use it cleanly.
